synopsis:
Jing, a bright-eyed youth is often underestimated, when in fact he is a very skilled master thief. On his travels from town to town he is accompanied by his trusted womanising bird-companion Kir, who can transform into a lethal weapon, the Kir Royale, when the need arises.
It is said that there is nothing that Jing cannot steal, and his legendary exploits have earned him the name Bandit King. Strangely enough no one recognises Jing's face though...Why does Postino always suddenly show up on his motorcycle with pertinent information? And to what amazing treasures will Jing's journey lead?
